price: ( ߞߏ߫ ߝߌ߬ߟߊ ) ߏ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߘߎߟߋ߲ߦߊߟߌ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߕߊ߲߬ߞߊ߬ߟߌ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߕߊ߫ ߡߍߣߍ߲߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā ẓalīlin walā yugh'nī mina al-lahabi
